entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water this afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water this evening. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
